item.title: Re-arrange servers
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: GoDaddy’s VPS (running CentOS) is my production machine for all public web sites (too many, cannot list all of them here), and will be the server for running PHP/C/C++ based applications. Ubuntu @ Shanghai home will be the primary machine for playing with Python, I’m going to spend some time on django. Machine @ US [...]
item.content:encoded:
GoDaddy’s VPS (running CentOS) is my production machine for all public web sites (too many, cannot list all of them here), and will be the server for running PHP/C/C++ based applications.

Ubuntu @ Shanghai home will be the primary machine for playing with Python, I’m going to spend some time on django.

Machine @ US home will be the machine for cluster testing, especially cloud-like stuffs like Cassandra, MongoDB, etc.

PowerBook will be retired soon (actually it is just lying down there without powered on), however, I will put Lisp related stuffs there to see how far I can go with Lisp.

I don’t have any further machines, and probably I don’t have time to take care of more.
